merge_operations.reason: Both clusters relate to the EcoBloom summer campaign. Cluster 001 focuses on initial planning and timelines, while cluster 006 details feedback and revisions. Merging them provides a complete view of the campaign's progression.

split_operations.reason: This cluster incorrectly combines discussions about two distinct projects: FitFusion rebranding and TechNova product launch. Separating them ensures clarity and makes it easier to find information related to each project.

ai_operations.reasoning: Cluster 003 (TechNova) and 004 (GreenScape) and 005 (UrbanEdge) each focus on a single, distinct project and represent a coherent conversation flow. They are of a reasonable size and do not require further splitting.  The merge operation consolidates the EcoBloom campaign discussions, providing a complete view of the project. The split operation corrects a significant error of combining two unrelated projects within a single cluster, improving searchability and clarity.
